title: Thinking in action: the De Bono thinking kit
brief_description: Edward De Bono believes that everyone can learn to think better and approach work more imaginatively. This course consists of six segments forming the core of a training session, a students’ manual and instructors’ manual. 1. Creativity, Design and Innovation. - 2. Improvement, Review and Productivity. - 3. People, Communication and Negotiation. - 4. Problems, Crisis and Opportunities. - 5. Decision, Choice and Evaluation. - 6. Action, Planning and Implementation.
